post.body: patobryan I tip my hat to you, I hobble around like a 2 legged train wreck but cant fathom the downtime to heal from surgery @ this point.
I credit the fact that I have an alternative choice rather than being trapped to you. THANK YOU !
Thank you to all you people out there who have touched my life! I thank you all! G'night
I know that everyones world is falling apart but I just feel so grateful for each moment. Strange... but in the most incredible way.
The kids & I laughed ourselves silly & I think we all need that sometimes. Somehow I don't remember the Buddha with a frown upon his face.
Those who consider me enlightened would have been horrified to see me pulling donuts on the ice with my kids on the 4by4. :-)
Survived the 1st snowstorm of the season. Its sad watching people lose it over 1+ feet of snow. They think the worlds ending!
The garland that blew off the neighbors porch looks better in my tree anyway.
Looks like a trop. storm hit the n. pole outside. yule decorations blowin around the neighborhood. two wreaths in the yard & neither is mine
I'll try to check in later.
I need an assistant so I can spend more time on twitter. Every time I sign in something in my world falls apart. Put politely this blows!
All the dominoes are available, I just need to decide how to stack them. Will sleep on it . G'night all!
I currently sell myself. my customers get a great bargain, It may not be the best way to build an empire but it pays the bills for now.
creating an action plan, it's a start I guess. I need to believe in & feel that what I'm selling will make a real diff. in my customers life
I need fear / fear = action. Everyone around me is being destroyed financially but I am at peace & confident in my ability to survive.
Thank god I'm not in politics I wouldn't survive long :-) Have a good one !
Am I willing to sacrifice the integrity of my word to a few in order to serve the many? I find this to be a major stumbling block .
I find it amusing that I'm willing to be thought a fool as long as my word is not questioned. In the end all we really have is our word.
I'm currently working on a list of those things that I'm not willing to do in my life in order to identify my blocks to success.
Off to seek coffee & sustenance. All hail the mighty coffee bean.
